detaileddescription.para:
Handle the drawing related tasks of the pre loaders
preload
pointer to an object
mask
the object will be drawn only in this area
mode
LV_DESIGN_COVER_CHK: only check if the object fully covers the 'mask_p' area (return 'true' if yes) LV_DESIGN_DRAW: draw the object (always return 'true') LV_DESIGN_DRAW_POST: drawing after every children are drawn
return
true/false, depends on 'mode'

Signal function of the pre loader
preload
pointer to a pre loader object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Create a pre loader object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new pre loader
copy
pointer to a pre loader object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created pre loader

Set the length of the spinning arc in degrees
preload
pointer to a preload object
deg
length of the arc

Set the spin time of the arc
preload
pointer to a preload object
time
time of one round in milliseconds

Set a style of a pre loader.
preload
pointer to pre loader object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Set the animation type of a preloadeer.
preload
pointer to pre loader object
type
animation type of the preload

Set the animation direction of a preloader
preload
pointer to pre loader object
direction
animation direction of the preload

Get the arc length [degree] of the a pre loader
preload
pointer to a pre loader object

Get the spin time of the arc
preload
pointer to a pre loader object [milliseconds]

Get style of a pre loader.
preload
pointer to pre loader object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to the style

Get the animation type of a preloadeer.
preload
pointer to pre loader object
animation type

Get the animation direction of a preloader
preload
pointer to pre loader object
animation direction

Automatically in an animation to rotate the arc of spinner.
ptr
pointer to preloader
val
the current desired value [0..360]
